item1: ITEM 1. BUSINESS General Development Business Progressive Corporation, insurance holding company, insurance non-insurance subsidiaries affiliates (references Item subsidiaries includes affiliates well). insurance subsidiaries write personal commercial auto insurance, personal residential property insurance, insurance motorcycles, watercraft, other recreational vehicles. also offer business-related general liability commercial property insurance predominantly small businesses, workers’ compensation insurance primarily transportation industry, other specialty property-casualty insurance provide related services.
item2: ITEM 2. MANAGEMENT’S DISCUSSION ANALYSIS FINANCIAL CONDITION RESULTS OPERATIONS. I.
